description: Defines a health check endpoint using Flask and flask_smorest, implementing a simple health check route that returns a 'Healthy' message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask MethodView that implements the health check endpoint.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check endpoint, returning a JSON message indicating system health.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
